amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill rules issued pursuant to an express grant of authority from Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 243 (Roll no. 413).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 243 (Roll no. 413).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
